message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $85. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $85 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $90? This is a fair price considering the value of the product for you.
